title: Night Vision Lynx R1 (Small experiment) Shader Graph Stereo Mode
description:
This video is just to show a small experiment I tried today and provide information on how you can use Shader Graph to do stereo view in Open XR.
Download: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1eXsK8F4-lC2UxUPVz7ojsaVwm8gu82RD?usp=drive_lin
author: Éloi Strée, ꬲ🧰: Raw video
